description:
Details of Condition 7 (Waste and recycle), Condition 11 (Delivery and Servicing
plan ), Condition 15 (Water consumption), Condition 16B (Materials), Condition 19 (Drainage), Condition 22 (Noise Impact Assessment) and Condition 23 (Car Park Management Plan ) submitted pursuant to planning permission 01054/359-363/P9 (P/2022/2335) dated 11/09/2023 for Variation of Condition 2 (Approved plans) to make alterations to the external appearance of the blocks and Variation of conditions 17 (drainage strategy) and 18 (sustainable drainage) to allow the alignment of the drawings approved under planning permission 01054/359-363/P8 dated 07/01/2022 for the variation of Condition 2 (approved plans) to allow minor alterations to internal layouts to front and rear blocks, minor elevation changes to reflect internal layout alterations including amendment to floor levels to the rear block, revision to cycle and refuse store layouts and positioning, alterations to external works to include repositioning of car park, access road, communal amenity space and landscaping of planning permission 01054/359-363/P7 dated 17/05/21 for erection of 28 flats within two four storey blocks with associated parking, cycle storage, refuse storage and landscaping
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
